metadata.title: CVE-2020-1702 containers/image: Container images read entire image manifest into memory (low)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A malicious container image can consume an unbounded amount of memory when being pulled to a container runtime host, such as Red Hat Enterprise Linux using podman, or OpenShift Container Platform. An attacker can use this flaw to trick a user, with privileges to pull container images, into crashing the process responsible for pulling the image.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
cri-o is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
